actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide additional resources to States to eliminate the backlog of unanalyzed rape kits and to ensure timely analysis of rape kits in the future.
short_title: Rape Kit DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2002

summary.text: Rape Kit DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2002 - Amends the DNA Backlog Elimination Act of 2000 to authorize the Attorney General to make grants to eligible States to carry out DNA analyses of samples from crime scenes (current law) to eliminate the backlog of unanalyzed rape kits and ensure their future timely analyses. Increases the authorization of appropriations for grants for DNA analysis for FY 2003 and 2004.

titles.title: Rape Kit DNA Analysis Backlog Elimination Act of 2002
A bill to provide additional resources to States to eliminate the backlog of unanalyzed rape kits and to ensure timely analysis of rape kits in the future.
